title: Generate Invoice for a Shipped Order
description: An order has been shipped to a customer. An agent in the finance department needs to generate and send the invoice.

tasks.description: Identify a sales order that has been marked as 'shipped'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a recently shipped order.

tasks.description: Generate an invoice for the order, including item costs, taxes, and shipping fees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates an accurate invoice.

tasks.description: Send the invoice to the customer's billing contact.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent emails the invoice to the customer.
